name: Trapped in a Nightmare
description:
Trapped in a Nightmare

A demon has captured you while you sleep and taken you to the nightmare realm. You need to escape, but in order to do that, you have to avoid the nightmare monsters and find ten dream orbs to activate the dream portal that allows you to exit the realm.

Can you escape from the nightmare realm or will you be stuck for all eternity?

Trapped in a Nightmare is a short 2D platformer I made in Unity. It was a part of my application for the Game Design & Production study program at Breda University of Applied Sciences. Happy to say that I was accepted! :)

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys to Move
Space to Jump
Mouse Click for Dialogue
